name: Planet Crash
description:
A simple game made in Godot.

Collect the mass from smaller planets to grow.

Avoid being absorbed by larger planets.

Become the largest planet to win!

Music: Goose Ninja - Space Music Pack (https://gooseninja.itch.io/space-music-pack)
Planet Art: Kenney Game Assets - Planets (https://kenney.nl/assets/planets)
